meteringmodes: Multi Average Spot Multi Average Spot
autofocus: Contrast Detect (sensor) Phase Detect Multi-area Center Selective single-point Single Continuous Face Detection Live View
externalflash: Yes (Dedicated TTL flash compatible hot shoe)
connectivity: USB 2.0 (480 Mbit/sec); mini HDMI; Wireless; Remote control
flashmodes: Activated when external flash is connected Red-eye removal OFF: Auto / Forced Flash / Slow Synchro / Suppressed Flash / Rear-curtain Synchro / Commander Red-eye removal ON: Red-eye Reduction Auto / Red-eye Reduction & Forced Flash / Suppressed Flash / Red-eye Reduction & Slow Synchro / Red-eye Reduction & Rear-curtain Synchro / Commander
